name: industrium
slogan: We're industrium. We're pioneering intelligent technologies for operational decision-making
description:
We’re changing how industry solves operational problems with an algorithm-driven decision-making platform, transforming from traditional paper-based processes to a networked ecosystem approach using machine guided decision engines with powerful real-time analytics and insights. 

Our innovative decision engines bring together all companies and users in a supply chain onto one SaaS platform - connecting people, resources and industry to the answers and information they need when they need it.
marketTags: B2B · SaaS · Mobile · Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

jobs.title: Head of Software Engineering
jobs.description:
Looking for a great project to really get involved with and create the technology agenda in a vibrant company with other experts in their fields? We are seeking a skilled software engineer with a storied history in the technological sector to guide and lead the development at industrium.io

industrium.io has been founded to create the platform for operational decision making for heavy industry. We are building solutions based upon algorithmic augmented human decisions, machine learning and real time analytics to revolutionise a multi trillion-dollar market which historically uses traditional management practices, manual document led processes and siloed operating structures.

This role will lead the technology agenda for the company. You will be a full stack developer and you will need to be a strategic thinker, an effective communicator and an expert in technological development.

Core Responsibilities:

* Setting a vision for how technology will be used in the company.
* Take a hands-on role to lead on the code, as well as setting the architecture for the group and managing internal and external development resources.
* Ensuring that the technological resources meet the company's short and long-term needs.
* Capable of scoping out a project with deliverables, timelines and budget.
* Creating timelines for the development and deployment of all technological services.
* Be able to build and staff a team and act as a mentor to team members.
* Maintaining a consumer-focused outlook and aiding in the delivering of software projects to market.
* Manage relationships with a variety of people including executives, contractors, partners and team members.
* Managing technology budgets and time frames.
* Be able to manage the development process.
* Staying on top of technology trends and developments.
* When sticky problems come about, lead on the code development to reach solutions
* Ensuring all technology practices adhere to regulatory and compliance standards.
* Be able to tell good code from bad.
* Ensure a high-level automated testing with great code coverage.
* Understand deployment and release management.
* Outline the goals for research and development.

Requirements

* Advanced technological skill set and a demonstrated history with technology.
* Exceptional team management skills.
* Excellent verbal and written communication.
* Ability to delegate efficiently.
* Extensive industry knowledge with an eye towards the future.
* Strong fundamentals in computer science and mathematics
* Worked in large data analytics and warehousing projects
* Ideally experience with critical infrastructure services with 99.999% uptime requirements into B2B marketspace

Technology Stack & Approach:

* Angular, Meteor, Python, PostgreSQL, Linux/Unix backend and development with AWS infrastructure
* Experience with machine learning applications
* Micro services, open standards, containerisation, automation and orchestration

Required Qualifications

* Bachelor’s Degree in relevant discipline, Master’s Degree desired

Market Knowledge (nice to have, not necessary)

* Knowledge or interest in the heavy industrial markets and the technologies being applied would be beneficial although not necessary. For example, the IoT rapidly changing the industrial space, robotization and full automation of mining projects etc…

Other Competencies

* Presentation: Excellent presentation skills to be able to present complex or detailed analysis into forms which are easily represented and understood at different levels within the organisation which clearly show identified outputs, consequences or discussion points
* Learning & Researching: Rapidly learns new tasks and quickly commits information to memory; Gathering comprehensive information to support decision making; Demonstrates a rapid understanding of newly presented information; Encourages an organisational learning approach (i.e. learns from successes and failures and seeks staff and customer feedback); Manages knowledge (collects, catalogues, and disseminates knowledge of use to the organisation).
* Delivering Results: Sets high standards for quality and quantity; Monitors and maintains quality and productivity; Works in a systematic, methodical and orderly way; consistently achieves project goals.

Other

* English fluency required, other languages a definite benefit
* Right to work in UK

Benefits

* Competitive salary
* Potential for equity options package
* Private health and life insurance package and gym membership benefits
* 30 days holiday plus additional day for your birthday
* We are CO2 neutral organisation from origination with a carbon offset programme for each employee
